E-Mail Messages
Date: Saturday, 4/1/2019
Subject: Retirement
Dear Sir,
It's been a hard decision, but I think I will retire
after this season. It's time to let the youngsters
take my job.

Regards,
Rene Piper



Date: Monday, 4/17/2019
Subject: James Melcher healing process
James Melcher is not recovering as fast as I have
hoped! So expect his injury to last about 7 more days.

Regards,
Team Doctor



Date: Thursday, 5/18/2019
Subject: Progress of Markus Mallory
Dear Sir,
Markus Mallory has an ERA of 3.00 at A !
I believe he is ready for the next level!

Regards,
Scouting Director



Date: Saturday, 5/27/2019
Subject: Contract extension
Hello,
I just wanted to let you know that I'm
in my last year of the contract.
Are you interested in giving me an extension?
I'd be happy to play for you again next year!

Regards,
Robert Hurst



Date: Monday, 5/29/2019
Subject: Contract extension question
Dear Sir,
My contract expires after this season.
I would like to resign, so please let's talk!

Regards,
Jason Augustin



Date: Wednesday, 6/7/2019
Subject: My role in this team
Sir,
I believe that I am deserving more than being a reliver.
I want a spot in the rotation, I think
I would do an adequate job. Otherwise, I'd like to play
elsewhere!

Regards,
Joseph Grajeda
